creator: apache2@cowboyfrank.net
text:
Using SSI, My Windows build of Apache is returning the wrong week and day numbers. Appears to have started at begining of March but not sure of the date. (Same results on a number of diferent machines running Windows 7 and Windows XP) Unix build on my hosted website is returning correct numbers. 
Bug demo page available here
http://coloradocowboy.org/ 
Thanks to everyone who develop and support all the Apache Products

creator: trawick@apache.org
text: Windows time conversion is breaking the day-of-year field for leap years.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
Fixed in apr trunk with 

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&revision=1372022

I'll backport to supported apr branches shortly.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text: Fixed in apr trunk as well as 1.5.x, 1.4.x, 0.9.x branches...
